text:
- Unical Aviation is a
very unique business.

We are a distribution
center for previously owned
and as removed aviation airplane parts.

With airplane parts, you
have to keep everything,
every record, every file, every picture.
So our data never shrinks.
We had decided to move the entire company
from California to Arizona.
We had over 200 servers that we needed

to move to another location
as we left California.
VMware Cloud on AWS has enabled us
to take steps towards the cloud.

We were able to take
our legacy applications,
which were not cloud ready,
and migrate them into a cloud environment,
which will now enable us to apply more

cloud native technology to
that legacy application.
So VMware Cloud on AWS
was a tremendous lifesaver for us.

We can run on AWS for about
three-fifths of the cost
of an on-premise data center.
Building on AWS is important to Unical
because we can be more flexible,
we can scale our company.
For us, it means that we get to work
with some really talented partners.

Deep Blue Cloud Computing
is a trusted partner.

They come with a very deep
bench of cloud architects

and network engineers
and solution providers.
And at the end of the day,
we can provide customer service success.
Now that our infrastructure's stable,

we're looking at what other
innovations we can do.
Because if we can dream it, we can do it.
